categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens actors

nodes.text: Charlie Akin (born April, 1989) is an English actor who played a Resistance Tech and a Stormtrooper and worked as a stand-in for Gwendoline Christie in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. He also played a Marine Soldier in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
